text: DPR Radio 105.5 is a full service FM station owned by the Sorsogon Provincial Disaster Risk Reduction and Management Office. Its studios & transmitter are located along Flores St., Capitol Compound, Brgy. Burabod, Sorsogon City.2015 ANNUAL PERFORMANCE REPORT | NTC Region 5MONTHLY CHAPTER ACTIVITY & ACCOMPLISHMENT REPORT ==References== Category:Radio stations in Sorsogon
title: DWDR
